kocabas2020vibe.paper_names: Vibe: Video inference for human body pose and shape estimation
kocabas2020vibe.authors: Kocabas, Muhammed and Athanasiou, Nikos and Black, Michael J
kocabas2020vibe.publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
kocabas2020vibe.brief: VIBE模型是视频人体动捕领域的经典之作，可以很好地对RGB视频中的人体动作进行捕捉，并且进行渲染可视化。
